Source string: Oh, yeah. Come to poppa!
Translation: Oh, yeah. Come to poppa!

Source string: Raz, what have you done? This is not control! This is chaos!
Translation: Raz, what have you done? This is not control! This is chaos!

Source string: I'll try to fix it. You stay here and keep their numbers under control.
Translation: I'll try to fix it. You stay here and keep their numbers under control.

Source string: This is a censor.
Translation: This is a censor.

Source string: Welcome to my mind.
Translation: Welcome to my mind.

Source string: Huh. It's so empty.
Translation: Huh. It's so empty.

Source string: Uh, I mean--
Translation: Uh, I mean--

Source string: There's more here than meets the eye, but I've learned to keep it under strict control.
Translation: There's more here than meets the eye, but I've learned to keep it under strict control.

Source string: And that's what I'm going to teach you: control.
Translation: And that's what I'm going to teach you: control.

Source string: Your feelings, your fears, your anger. You must learn to control them, focus them, concentrate them, and release them.
Translation: Your feelings, your fears, your anger. You must learn to control them, focus them, concentrate them, and release them.

Source string: As therapy?
Translation: As therapy?

Source string: No, as firepower!
Translation: No, as firepower!

Source string: Say something hideous and horrible jumps out at you. Something so disgusting that it simply must die.
Translation: Say something hideous and horrible jumps out at you. Something so disgusting that it simply must die.

Source string: Ahhh, oh, so tacky... I can't... look... directly at it!
Translation: Ahhh, oh, so tacky... I can't... look... directly at it!

Source string: But I control those feelings, focus them, concentrate, and
Translation: But I control those feelings, focus them, concentrate, and

Source string: release!
Translation: release!

Source string: And the world is a better place.
Translation: And the world is a better place.

Source string: Your turn.
Translation: Your turn.

Source string: Okay...
Translation: Okay...

Source string: Hggfgg!  Gahhh!
Translation: Hggfgg!  Gahhh!

Source string: Excellent. A victory for good taste.
Translation: Excellent. A victory for good taste.

Source string: Now, you must strive for precision when targeting. Say you were set upon by multiple attackers.
Translation: Now, you must strive for precision when targeting. Say you were set upon by multiple attackers.

Source string: Eh.
Translation: Eh.

Source string: Yecch.
Translation: Yecch.

Source string: Bleh.
Translation: Bleh.

Source string: But you need to dispense with them in a certain order. Eliminate these monsters in the proper sequence and we can move on to the next lesson.
Translation: But you need to dispense with them in a certain order. Eliminate these monsters in the proper sequence and we can move on to the next lesson.

Source string: Young man, I hope you've learned a lesson here today.
Translation: Young man, I hope you've learned a lesson here today.

Source string: Yes I have.
Translation: Yes I have.

Source string: That shooting things is fun and useful.
Translation: That shooting things is fun and useful.

Source string: No, that once you lose control of your own mind, it's very hard to get it back!
Translation: No, that once you lose control of your own mind, it's very hard to get it back!

Source string: Yes. One's thoughts must be 100% controlled at all times!
Translation: Yes. One's thoughts must be 100% controlled at all times!

Source string: Well, no. Actually, if you try to completely suppress your undesirable feelings, they'll build and build and eventually explode.
Translation: Well, no. Actually, if you try to completely suppress your undesirable feelings, they'll build and build and eventually explode.

Source string: Oh. So, uh, what would happen if you were to, say, completely block off all your censor outlets?
Translation: Oh. So, uh, what would happen if you were to, say, completely block off all your censor outlets?

Source string: Well, there would be a buildup of censor energy within, that would... uh eventually
Translation: Well, there would be a buildup of censor energy within, that would... uh eventually

Source string: Run, Razputin. Very fast.
Translation: Run, Razputin. Very fast.

Source string: You are my own creation. I command you to stop!
Translation: You are my own creation. I command you to stop!

Source string: Ahhhhhhh!
Translation: Ahhhhhhh!

Source string: Razputin, it's time to earn your merit badge!
Translation: Razputin, it's time to earn your merit badge!

Source string: Again.
Translation: Again.

Source string: Come now. Focus.
Translation: Come now. Focus.

Source string: Shoot!
Translation: Shoot!

Source string: Repeat.
Translation: Repeat.

Source string: What are you waiting for?
Translation: What are you waiting for?

Source string: Let's get moving.
Translation: Let's get moving.

Source string: Excellent.
Translation: Excellent.

Source string: Control.
Translation: Control.

Source string: Focus.
Translation: Focus.

Source string: Concentrate.
Translation: Concentrate.

Source string: Release.
Translation: Release.

Source string: Try it again.
Translation: Try it again.

Source string: Ahhhhh!
Translation: Ahhhhh!

Source string: Ach!
Translation: Ach!

Source string: Ai-ai-ai-ai-ai!
Translation: Ai-ai-ai-ai-ai!

Source string: Razputin!
Translation: Razputin!

Source string: Oooh-ooh-oooh...
Translation: Oooh-ooh-oooh...

Source string: Peel me off and put me down!
Translation: Peel me off and put me down!

Source string: Enough!
Translation: Enough!

Source string: Oof!
Translation: Уф!

Source string: Uggg!
Translation: Uggg!

Source string: Ow!
Translation: Ow!

Source string: Gahhhh!
Translation: Gahhhh!

Source string: No, Raz, shoot them in order. Let's try this again.
Translation: No, Raz, shoot them in order. Let's try this again.

Source string: This is controlled by that dial over there.
Translation: This is controlled by that dial over there.

Source string: This is going to take forever. I wonder if I can speed it up somehow.
Translation: This is going to take forever. I wonder if I can speed it up somehow.

Source string: I wonder what would happen if I turned that dial up.
Translation: I wonder what would happen if I turned that dial up.

Source string: So, is this where I get a speech and learn another lesson?
Translation: So, is this where I get a speech and learn another lesson?

Source string: No. Here's your merit badge. Let us never speak of this again.
Translation: No. Here's your merit badge. Let us never speak of this again.

Source string: Now then...
Translation: Now then...

Source string: Is this what you saw in your vision?
Translation: Is this what you saw in your vision?

Source string: An integral part of any sane person's mind.
Translation: An integral part of any sane person's mind.

Source string: The censors roam through your psyche, looking for thoughts that don't belong.
Translation: The censors roam through your psyche, looking for thoughts that don't belong.

Source string: Hallucinations, manias, waking dreams--the censors hunt them down and censor them out.
Translation: Hallucinations, manias, waking dreams--the censors hunt them down and censor them out.

Source string: Why do they come after me? I'm not a mania!
Translation: Why do they come after me? I'm not a mania!

Source string: Yes, but you are a foreign entity in my mind. You technically don't belong here.
Translation: Yes, but you are a foreign entity in my mind. You technically don't belong here.

Source string: Yes. Well, the Brain Tumbler could be malfunctioning. Or you could be insane.
Translation: Yes. Well, the Brain Tumbler could be malfunctioning. Or you could be insane.

Source string: We'll test for that later. For now...
Translation: We'll test for that later. For now...

Source string: So, what do I do?
Translation: So, what do I do?

Source string: Blast it!
Translation: Blast it!

Source string: That's the spirit.
Translation: That's the spirit.

Source string: I killed it.
Translation: I killed it.

Source string: It was just a thought I was having. And it's not dead. It has just returned to its basic form--raw psychic energy. Go absorb it. It's good for your mental health.
Translation: It was just a thought I was having. And it's not dead. It has just returned to its basic form--raw psychic energy. Go absorb it. It's good for your mental health.

Source string: Now I'll leave the machine on for you, so you can practice. You have to blast 1000 censors to earn your Marksmanship Merit Badge.
Translation: Now I'll leave the machine on for you, so you can practice. You have to blast 1000 censors to earn your Marksmanship Merit Badge.

Source string: Come back every day for practice, and you should have enough in as little as three weeks!
Translation: Come back every day for practice, and you should have enough in as little as three weeks!

Source string: Three weeks! I only have a few days to earn ALL my merit badges and become a Psychonaut.
Translation: Three weeks! I only have a few days to earn ALL my merit badges and become a Psychonaut.

Source string: Slow and steady wins the race, my eager young friend. Now practice. Slowly and carefully.
Translation: Slow and steady wins the race, my eager young friend. Now practice. Slowly and carefully.

Source string: Oh man...
Translation: Oh man...

Source string: I need to stop whatever's shooting out these censors!
Translation: I need to stop whatever's shooting out these censors!

Source string: Those little censors are re-energizing the big one somehow.
Translation: Those little censors are re-energizing the big one somehow.

Source string: This should stop any more censors from coming out of here.
Translation: This should stop any more censors from coming out of here.

Source string: Destroy them all!
Translation: Destroy them all!

Source string: Well done, Raz. Keep shooting!
Translation: Well done, Raz. Keep shooting!

Source string: Good. Again!
Translation: Good. Again!

Source string: Razputin! You must blast the emergency shut-down valves!
Translation: Razputin! You must blast the emergency shut-down valves!

Source string: It's the only way to close off the leak!
Translation: It's the only way to close off the leak!

Source string: Shut down all the valves on this face to get it under control!
Translation: Shut down all the valves on this face to get it under control!

Source string: Hurry, Razputin!
Translation: Hurry, Razputin!

Source string: Yes, yes. We all know you can punch things.
Translation: Yes, yes. We all know you can punch things.

Source string: But you're supposed to be learning how to use your PSI Blast now.
Translation: But you're supposed to be learning how to use your PSI Blast now.

Source string: Try it without punching.
Translation: Try it without punching.

Source string: That's it! I've completely blocked off all of Sasha's censor outlets!  I can't wait to tell him.
Translation: That's it! I've completely blocked off all of Sasha's censor outlets!  I can't wait to tell him.

Source string: Enough horseplay, Razputin! Destroy him!
Translation: Enough horseplay, Razputin! Destroy him!

Source string: The small censors are feeding into his strength. You must stop them!
Translation: The small censors are feeding into his strength. You must stop them!

Source string: Destroy the valves that are emitting the small censors, Razputin!
Translation: Destroy the valves that are emitting the small censors, Razputin!

Source string: Raz! Shoot the valves! It's no use shooting the monster until you've destroyed every valve!
Translation: Raz! Shoot the valves! It's no use shooting the monster until you've destroyed every valve!

Source string: Don't forget to use your mental focus to lock on the valves as a target, and then blast them!
Translation: Don't forget to use your mental focus to lock on the valves as a target, and then blast them!

Source string: Use {LeftFlipper} to lock mental focus.
Translation: Use {LeftFlipper} to lock mental focus.

Source string: Say, Razputin. Do you think you could reach in my pocket and hand me my cigarettes?
Translation: Say, Razputin. Do you think you could reach in my pocket and hand me my cigarettes?

Source string: Excellent! You've shut down the valves so he cannot be rejuvenated. Now destroy him!
Translation: Excellent! You've shut down the valves so he cannot be rejuvenated. Now destroy him!

Source string: Use your mental focus Razputin! It will help you shoot accurately, and also help you with your evasive maneuvers!
Translation: Use your mental focus Razputin! It will help you shoot accurately, and also help you with your evasive maneuvers!

Source string: When focused, you can tumble to the side, avoid his stamp, and circle around behind the monster!
Translation: When focused, you can tumble to the side, avoid his stamp, and circle around behind the monster!

Source string: Watch out for those tumbling boils he's throwing at you. They're full of censors!
Translation: Watch out for those tumbling boils he's throwing at you. They're full of censors!

Source string: You can kill many small censors in one blow, if you jump up in the air above them and then smash the ground with your psychic fist.
Translation: You can kill many small censors in one blow, if you jump up in the air above them and then smash the ground with your psychic fist.

Source string: Press {XButton} while airborne to execute a Palm Bomb.
Translation: Press {XButton} while airborne to execute a Palm Bomb.

Source string: Oh, you. What a pleasant surprise.
Translation: Oh, you. What a pleasant surprise.

Source string: Enough, Razputin! The beast must die, now!
Translation: Enough, Razputin! The beast must die, now!

Source string: If you are mentally focused, and executing a sideways tumble, it will be very hard for him to stamp you.
Translation: If you are mentally focused, and executing a sideways tumble, it will be very hard for him to stamp you.

Source string: Razputin, if you could finish this off soon, I might get out of it with only a mild concussion.
Translation: Razputin, if you could finish this off soon, I might get out of it with only a mild concussion.

Source string: What? Who's there? I think I've lost my vision!
Translation: What? Who's there? I think I've lost my vision!

Source string: Why no, Aunt Bernie, of course I didn't get your phone calls or else I would have responded right away.
Translation: Why no, Aunt Bernie, of course I didn't get your phone calls or else I would have responded right away.

Source string: My name is Yan Yanssen, I live in Wisconsin, I work in the lumber yard there...
Translation: My name is Yan Yanssen, I live in Wisconsin, I work in the lumber yard there...

Source string: La di da... do do da dum...
Translation: La di da... do do da dum...

Source string: Wow. Okay, that last hit brought me back. Where was I?
Translation: Wow. Okay, that last hit brought me back. Where was I?

Source string: Um, well, it sure seemed a lot bigger in my head.
Translation: Um, well, it sure seemed a lot bigger in my head.

Source string: Ah, problems often seem larger in our heads than they really are. That's an important lesson to learn.
Translation: Ah, problems often seem larger in our heads than they really are. That's an important lesson to learn.

Source string: But--
Translation: But--

Source string: Yes, but I was attacked in my own head.
Translation: Yes, but I was attacked in my own head.

Source string: Um... Well...
Translation: Um... Well...

Source string: The machine is having a little trouble. I'm looking into it. Meanwhile...
Translation: The machine is having a little trouble. I'm looking into it. Meanwhile...

Source string: As you absorb this energy, your mental health increases.
Translation: As you absorb this energy, your mental health increases.

Source string: But as you PSI Blast, you expend your will to do damage.
Translation: But as you PSI Blast, you expend your will to do damage.

Source string: So be on the look out for these small, dense clusters of raw psychic aggression.
Translation: So be on the look out for these small, dense clusters of raw psychic aggression.

Source string: Absorb these as well to make sure you always have enough firepower.
Translation: Absorb these as well to make sure you always have enough firepower.

Source string: Hm. They're coming out faster but still not fast enough.
Translation: Hm. They're coming out faster but still not fast enough.

Source string: Hm. Still not fast enough!
Translation: Hm. Still not fast enough!

Source string: Uh oh.
Translation: Uh oh.

Source string: Good shooting, Raz, but you are making it harder than it needs to be.
Translation: Good shooting, Raz, but you are making it harder than it needs to be.

Source string: You need to practice locking your mental focus.
Translation: You need to practice locking your mental focus.

Source string: It makes targeting and evasive maneuvers much easier.
Translation: It makes targeting and evasive maneuvers much easier.

Source string: Let's try again, this time lock your mental focus.
Translation: Let's try again, this time lock your mental focus.

Source string: Razputin, see those valves? That is where the censors are leaking out.
Translation: Razputin, see those valves? That is where the censors are leaking out.

Source string: PSI Blast the valves to shut them down and get this area under control!
Translation: PSI Blast the valves to shut them down and get this area under control!

Source string: Good, now the next one. You have to get them all.
Translation: Good, now the next one. You have to get them all.

Source string: Good, well you got them all.
Translation: Good, well you got them all.

Source string: Oh, no. You close one leak down and another springs up!
Translation: Oh, no. You close one leak down and another springs up!

Source string: Well come on. We've got to take care of these too!
Translation: Well come on. We've got to take care of these too!

Source string: Oh, no. What are you doing back in here?
Translation: Oh, no. What are you doing back in here?

Source string: Practicing.
Translation: Practicing.

Source string: Oh, would you like to run the course again?
Translation: Oh, would you like to run the course again?

Source string: Yeah, I--run the course? But all that censor overload stuff... that was an accident.
Translation: Yeah, I--run the course? But all that censor overload stuff... that was an accident.

Source string: Oh, Raz. I knew you were going to overload that switch. I would have done the same thing at your age.
Translation: Oh, Raz. I knew you were going to overload that switch. I would have done the same thing at your age.

Source string: It was all arranged to make you an expert fighter. And it worked.
Translation: It was all arranged to make you an expert fighter. And it worked.

Source string: Now, if you'd like to run the course again, just shoot the controller on any given face.
Translation: Now, if you'd like to run the course again, just shoot the controller on any given face.

Source string: To close that face up and open another, shoot any censor valves you see.
Translation: To close that face up and open another, shoot any censor valves you see.

Source string: Fair enough?
Translation: Fair enough?

Source string: Even the part where the giant censor had you on the stamp?
Translation: Even the part where the giant censor had you on the stamp?

Source string: Okay, that part got a little out of hand. We won't be seeing him again.
Translation: Okay, that part got a little out of hand. We won't be seeing him again.

Source string: Razputin! I'm so glad to see you. What's happened?
Translation: Razputin! I'm so glad to see you. What's happened?

Source string: Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world with a fleet of psychic death tanks, armed with the stolen brains of my fellow campers.
Translation: Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world with a fleet of psychic death tanks, armed with the stolen brains of my fellow campers.

Source string: Where are you?
Translation: Where are you?

Source string: I... I have no idea. I seem to be... asleep... or in a trance...
Translation: I... I have no idea. I seem to be... asleep... or in a trance...

Source string: Well don't worry about it. Ford and I are on the case.
Translation: Well don't worry about it. Ford and I are on the case.

Source string: Okay. I'd love to join you, but I think I need to focus on maintaining some level of brain activity.
Translation: Okay. I'd love to join you, but I think I need to focus on maintaining some level of brain activity.

Source string: Ooh, I can help with that! Let me shoot up the place!
Translation: Ooh, I can help with that! Let me shoot up the place!

Source string: Move RIGHT {Joystick} while holding {LeftFlipper} to switch targets.
Translation: Move RIGHT {Joystick} while holding {LeftFlipper} to switch targets.

Source string: Press {RightFlipper} to shoot.
Translation: Press {RightFlipper} to shoot.

Source string: Hold {LeftFlipper} to lock on to a target.
Translation: Hold {LeftFlipper} to lock on to a target.

Source string: Hold {LeftFlipper} to lock on, then press {RightFlipper}
Translation: Hold {LeftFlipper} to lock on, then press {RightFlipper}

Source string: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press {AButton} and move the LEFT {Joystick} to execute a fast tumble in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
Translation: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press {AButton} and move the LEFT {Joystick} to execute a fast tumble in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!

Source string: DAILY MAXIMUM REACHED for this Censor output setting. Please increase Censor output setting if more Censors are desired.
Translation: DAILY MAXIMUM REACHED for this Censor output setting. Please increase Censor output setting if more Censors are desired.

Source string: Enough horseplay, Razputin!
Translation: Enough horseplay, Razputin!

Source string: Razputin, instead of that why don't you help me free Ms. Zanotto?
Translation: Razputin, instead of that why don't you help me free Ms. Zanotto?
